author: nd
msg: When using Redirect in directory context, append requested query
string if there's no one supplied by configuration.

author: jim
msg: Note that I like the idea, but need actual code

author: joes
msg: Use APR's Boyer-Moore-Horspool algorithm (from apr_strmatch.h) in mfd parser to search for boundary strings.
